content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-325-07-A |Item_parent=Identification and management of risks associated with medicines and biomaterials, iatrogenic risk, medicinal errors (see items 4 and 5) |Item_parent_short=Identification and management of risks associated with medicines and biomaterials, iatrogenic risk, medication errors (see items 4 and 5) |Rank=A |Title=Know the characteristics of ADRs in the elderly |Description=None |Section=Definition |Contributors=Marie Briet |Order=7}} == Characteristics of ADRs in elderly subjects == * Increased frequency and severity (co-morbidities, multiple medications, age-related pharmacokinetic changes) * Varied symptomatology, atypical clinical presentations * Main drugs involved: cardiovascular drugs, psychotropic drugs, anticoagulants, non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, etc.

question.question: What is a characteristic of ADRs in elderly subjects?
question.option_a: They are less severe and less frequent
question.option_b: They are more severe and have varied symptomatology
question.option_c: They are only caused by cardiovascular drugs
question.option_d: They are not influenced by age-related pharmacokinetic changes
